Title: Relates to expanding the definition of bus to include certain buses owned and operated for the transportation of children less than school age
Summary: Expands the definition of bus to include those owned by public or governmental agency, pre-school, nursery school or private school or privately owned and operated for compensation for the transportation of children less than school age, teachers and other persons to and from a pre-school, nursery school or school activities.
LawCode: Amd ยง509-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to expanding the definition of bus
